name: Activate an item
notes: Start vehicle, turn on device, ignite lightsaber.

relatedSkills.when: device needs login or friendly computer

name: Aid another
notes: Aid a skill or attack. Skill aid: DC 10 same skill to grant +2 to ally. Aid attack: attack vs Ref 10 to grant +2 to ally vs that target.

relatedSkills.outcome: +2 bonus to ally on that check
+2 to ally's next attack vs that target

name: Aim
notes: Ignore target's cover bonus to Reflex on next attack; lose aim if you lose LOS or take other action before attacking; provokes AoO.

relatedSkills.when: applies to next ranged attack to ignore cover

name: Attack (single)
notes: Normal attack; rate and damage depend on weapon. Melee 2‑handed uses STR×2 to damage; improvised = -5 attack.

relatedSkills.outcome: Compare to target Reflex/Fort/Will as appropriate

name: Area Attack (burst/splash/cone)
notes: Compare attack roll (if >=10) to each target's Ref; hits full, misses half; natural 20 hits all; cannot aim for area attacks.

relatedSkills.outcome: Resolve against each target's Ref; apply cover rules

name: Burst Fire / Autofire (vehicle or weapon)
notes: Autofire targets area 2×2 squares, -5 attack; consumes ammo; braced autofire reduces penalty; burst fire -5 attack +2 dice damage.

relatedSkills.outcome: Area rules; ammo consumption handled by system

name: Charge
notes: Move in straight line; +2 competence to attack; take -2 Reflex until next turn; cannot take other actions after attack.

relatedSkills.outcome: Apply +2 competence, -2 target Reflex

relatedSkills.when: Nimble Charge: to charge through low objects/difficult terrain

name: Coup de Grace
notes: Full-Round Action against a Helpless target. Can use melee weapon or ranged weapon if adjacent. Automatically scores a Critical Hit dealing double damage. Target reduced to 0 HP dies instantly. Unconscious or disabled defenders hit by Coup de Grace die instantly. Cannot use against vehicles or objects.

relatedSkills.outcome: Auto-critical hit; double damage; instant death if reduced to 0 HP

name: Draw or Holster Weapon
notes: Draw as move (or draw & activate if weapon requires activation and you are proficient). Drawing concealed weapons = standard.

relatedSkills.when: drawing concealed item in secret; GM may allow opposed Perception

name: Drop an item
notes: Drop item into your space or adjacent square; free/simple.

name: Draw concealed item (conceal/seek)
notes: If concealed on self, drawing is standard and may be opposed by Perception.

relatedSkills.outcome: Detect drawing or concealed item

name: Feint
notes: Deception vs target's Initiative to make target flat-footed vs your next attack. -5 vs non-humanoids/low INT.

relatedSkills.outcome: Target loses Dex bonus to Ref vs your next attack

name: Fight defensively
notes: Standard: -5 attacks, +2 dodge to Ref (or +5 if trained in Acrobatics). Full-round no attacks: +5 dodge (+10 if trained).

name: Full attack
notes: Make multiple attacks; penalties apply to all attacks until next turn; two-weapon penalties apply.

relatedSkills.outcome: Resolve sequence with multiple attack penalties

name: Grapple / Grab
notes: Unarmed attack to grab (-5). If hit, make opposed grapple checks (Grapple uses STR or DEX + BAB + size). Grappled target is denied movement and has -2 attack unless using light weapon.

relatedSkills.outcome: Grabbed/grappled; escape via Acrobatics vs Grappler's check

relatedSkills.when: escape from grapple; DC = grappler's check

name: Disarm
notes: Melee attack at -10 (-15 if weapon held in more than 1 hand). Failure may provoke free attack against you.

relatedSkills.outcome: If succeed, weapon drops; Acrobatics DC20 to catch item (trained)

name: Escape bonds / Escape net
notes: Escape nets: Acrobatics DC15 as full-round; nets often require higher DC to escape as standard.

relatedSkills.outcome: Escape nets; success frees you

name: Manipulate an item
notes: Pick up item (provokes AoO), load weapon (provokes AoO), open door, retrieve templates/apps/stored item (2 move actions, provokes AoO).

name: Move your speed / Move action
notes: Move up to speed; diagonal counts as 2 squares; options include Balance (half speed), Climb (1/4 speed), Tumble (part of move with Acrobatics).

relatedSkills.when: Climb surfaces; see Climb DC table

name: Tumble
notes: Acrobatics DC15 to move through threatened squares without provoking AoO; each threatened square counts as 2 squares of movement.

relatedSkills.outcome: Avoid AoO when moving through threatened spaces

name: Run
notes: Move 4× speed (3× if heavy armor), lose Dex bonus to Ref; can run for CON rounds, then Endurance checks.

relatedSkills.outcome: If fail, -1 persistent CT

name: Reload
notes: Reload is normally a move action and provokes AoO unless specified otherwise.

name: Second Wind
notes: Once per encounter/day: if at or below half hp, heal 1/4 max HP or CON (whichever higher).

name: Snipe
notes: From hiding: make ranged attack then hide again (Stealth check at -10 as move). Must be at least 2 squares away.

relatedSkills.outcome: If success remain hidden; if fail, revealed

name: Stand up from prone
notes: Stand normally as move; trained in Acrobatics can DC15 to stand as swift.

relatedSkills.when: Stand from prone as swift if trained

name: Fall prone
notes: If trained in Acrobatics DC15 you can fall prone as a free action; otherwise swift. Prone penalties apply.

relatedSkills.when: Fall prone as free action if trained

name: Ready an action (prepare)
notes: Specify a trigger and action (move/standard/swift). When trigger occurs you may take the readied action as a reaction; initiative changes to the time you used it.

name: Ready or Recovery actions for vehicles
notes: Vehicle actions include Raise/lower shields (swift), Recharge shields (3 swift w/ Mechanics DC20), regulate power (3 swifts Mechanics DC20).

relatedSkills.outcome: Retemplates/apps/store SR or move vehicle CT

name: Perception / Notice targets
notes: Perception vs Stealth or passive size DCs; reaction to notice entering LOS. Reaction swift to retry failed Perception.

relatedSkills.outcome: Notice hidden/concealed targets; apply concealment/cover penalties

name: Create a Diversion to Hide
notes: Deception vs all targets' Will to allow a Stealth attempt while targets are aware. You must be able to reach hiding place with a move.

relatedSkills.outcome: If success, allow Stealth attempt

name: Use Computer / Access information
notes: Use Computer checks to access info: general 15 (1 min), specific 20 (10 min), private 25 (1 hr), secret 30 (1 day) when computer attitude allows.

relatedSkills.outcome: Access levels depend on DC; computer attitude modifies results

name: Use the Force (example: Move Light Object / Breath Control)
notes: UtF powers often require trained UtF checks. Move Light Object: UtF DC10 (move action). Breath Control (UtF) DC15 to double hold-breath rounds.

relatedSkills.outcome: Power effect if succeed; failure consequences vary

name: First Aid / Revivify / Treat Injury
notes: First Aid (medpac) DC15 heal; Revivify DC25 (requires medkit) to revive within 1 round of death.

relatedSkills.outcome: Heals HP or revives on success

name: Disengage / Withdraw
notes: Withdraw at half speed; treat first square as non-threatened; cannot withdraw if must move more than one square to exit threatened area.

name: Maiming Foes
notes: Declare intent to maim instead of kill. Make attack at -5 penalty. On hit, deal half damage. If attack reduces target to 0 HP, target is maimed but alive instead of dead.

relatedSkills.outcome: Half damage; target maimed at 0 HP instead of dying

name: Anticipate Enemy Strategy
notes: Trained in Knowledge (Tactics) only. Make Knowledge (Tactics) check vs target's Will Defense (or 10 + target's CL if no Will Defense). Success reveals target's likely next action, who they'll attack, where they'll move, or other strategies.

relatedSkills.outcome: Gain insight into target's next action and strategy

name: Recover
notes: Spend three Swift Actions in same round or across consecutive rounds to move +1 step up the Condition Track. Cannot use Recover while afflicted by a Persistent Condition.

name: Feign Haywire
notes: Droids only. Pop open access panels, move erratically, make mechanical noises. Make Deception check vs Will Defense of all targets in line of sight. Success: target is Flat-Footed against you. Ends at end of your turn if you take any action. Targets no longer Flat-Footed after Deception ends.

dc.target: All targets' Will Defense (must be in LOS)

relatedSkills.outcome: Targets with Will Defense <= Deception check are Flat-Footed against you

name: Treat Poison
notes: Trained in Treat Injury only. Requires Medical Kit. Make a Treat Injury check; if result equals or exceeds the Poison's DC, you successfully detoxify the poison in the character's system and the patient no longer suffers any ill effects (including Persistent Conditions caused by the poison).

relatedSkills.outcome: On success, detoxify poison and remove all effects/persistent conditions caused by it

name: Switch Weapon Mode
notes: Some weapons have multiple modes (lethal/stun, single-shot/autofire, etc). Switching weapon modes takes a Swift Action.
